label: uncl6311
comment: Code qualifying the purpose of the measurement.

values.label: Line item measurement
values.comment: Line item measurement specified by the Food and Drug Administration.

values.label: Transport conditions for delivery to distribution centre
values.comment: Specified measurements refer to transport conditions for delivery to a distribution centre.

values.label: Retail container size
values.comment: Size of a retail container in terms of volume.

values.label: Other US Government agency application
values.comment: Measurement to be used by/for other United States government agencies.

values.label: Measurement
values.comment: [6314] To specify the value of a measurement.

values.label: Customs line item measurement
values.comment: The measurement of a consignment or part for customs purpose.

values.label: Alcohol content
values.comment: The measurement of the alcohol content.

values.label: Dimensions total weight
values.comment: The total weight of an identified dimension.

values.label: Item weight
values.comment: Weight at line item level.

values.label: Visa quantity
values.comment: Measurement reportable for visaed merchandise.

values.label: Licence (quantity deducted)
values.comment: Quantity to be written off from the total license amount.

values.label: Cargo loaded
values.comment: Total tonnage of cargo loaded onto the conveyance.

values.label: Cargo discharged
values.comment: Total tonnage of cargo unloaded from the conveyance.

values.label: Weight of conveyance
values.comment: Tonnage of conveyance.

values.label: Conveyance summer dead weight
values.comment: Registered summer dead weight total tonnage of the vessel.

values.label: Containerized cargo on vessel's weight
values.comment: Total weight of containerized cargo on vessel.

values.label: Non-containerized cargo on vessel's weight
values.comment: Total weight of non-containerized cargo on vessel.

values.label: 1st specified tariff quantity
values.comment: Primary reportable quantity associated with a tariff number.

values.label: 2nd specified tariff quantity
values.comment: Secondary reportable quantity associated with a tariff number.

values.label: 3rd specified tariff quantity
values.comment: Third reportable quantity associated with a tariff number.

values.label: Package
values.comment: Commodity/product shipped or sold in discrete individual containers which may be accumulated in a larger package.

values.label: Person
values.comment: Physical measurement of a person.

values.label: Accuracy
values.comment: Accuracy of the measurements being sent.

values.label: Consignment measurement
values.comment: Measurement related to a consignment; to be specified by the measurement code dimension value.

values.label: Package measurement
values.comment: Measurements of package.

values.label: Handling unit measurement
values.comment: Measurements of handling unit.

values.label: Unit of measure used for ordered quantities
values.comment: The unit of measure in which ordered quantities are expressed.

values.label: Transport conditions for delivery to market
values.comment: Specified measurements refer to transport conditions for delivery to the market.

values.label: Storage conditions to guarantee product freshness until best before date
values.comment: Specified measurements refer to storage conditions to guarantee the product freshness until best before date.

values.label: Ventilation
values.comment: The number of air exchanges per hour.

values.label: Original unit of issue
values.comment: A code identifying the original unit of issue.

values.label: External dimension
values.comment: The outer measurement of the referenced item or package.

values.label: Internal dimension
values.comment: The inner measurement of the referenced item or package.

values.label: Test piece dimensions
values.comment: The size of the test piece that was tested.

values.label: Average reading
values.comment: Average reading of the test being reported on.

values.label: Comparison price measurement
values.comment: A measurement used for comparison pricing purposes.

values.label: Unit of measure per unit of issue
values.comment: Provides the unit of measurement which is to be used for a given unit of issue.

values.label: Air flow
values.comment: The movement of air.

values.label: Velocity
values.comment: Speed.

values.label: Supplementary unit
values.comment: Supplementary unit referring to the measurement reported.

values.label: Quota
values.comment: Maximum number or amount.

values.label: Unit of time
values.comment: The specification of a specific unit of time.

values.label: Unit of measure used for invoiced quantities
values.comment: Unit of measure of invoiced quantity.

values.label: Usable or consumable content
values.comment: Measurement of usable or consumable contents.

values.label: Payment cycle
values.comment: Measurement of the period of time over which payment occurs.

values.label: Plot size
values.comment: The relative bigness of a plot or an allotment of land.

values.label: Space occupied
values.comment: Space taken up or filled.

values.label: Building size
values.comment: The relative bigness of a permanent fixed structure forming an enclosure.

values.label: Office size
values.comment: The relative bigness of a room or building used for clerical or similar work.

values.label: Area damaged
values.comment: The size of an area that was damaged.

values.label: Land size
values.comment: The relative bigness of an expanse of ground.

values.label: Industrial plant size
values.comment: The relative bigness of a factory or facility used in an industrial process.

values.label: Installed capacity
values.comment: The maximum amount that can be contained or produced.

values.label: Warehouse size
values.comment: The relative bigness of a structure in which things are temporarily stored.

values.label: Volume to dispose
values.comment: Volume to get rid of.

values.label: Volume to produce
values.comment: Volume which will be generated.

values.label: Commodity size
values.comment: The size name, dimensions, or weight of the commodity.

values.label: Free surface moment
values.comment: Effects of force caused by free-surface effects in partly-filled tanks.

values.label: Estimated gross weight
values.comment: Estimated weight (mass) of goods, including packing.

values.label: Fat content
values.comment: A code to indicate the fat content of a product, e.g. cheese.

values.label: Test measure value
values.comment: Specification of a value which was measured for test purposes.

values.label: Size
values.comment: Dimensions or magnitude of an object.

values.label: Maximum dimension using a functionality
values.comment: Maximum dimension of an article using a functionality (e.g. extendable sofabed).

values.label: Minimum dimension using a functionality
values.comment: Minimum dimension of an article using a functionality (e.g. folding chair).

values.label: Mattress dimension
values.comment: Dimension of a mattress, i.e. not the total dimension of the bed frame.

values.label: Seat dimension
values.comment: Seat dimension of a chair etc., not total dimension.

values.label: Maximum storage capacity
values.comment: Code qualifying the purpose of the measurement, to indicate the maximum storage capacity

values.label: Quantity to be generated
values.comment: Code qualifying the purpose of the measurement, to indicate the quantity to be generated

values.label: Supplemental tariff classification quantity
values.comment: Supplemental quantity reportable for a tariff number.

values.label: 1st specified tariff quantity, general rules of interpretation 3(c) or 3(b)
values.comment: The first reportable quantity associated with a tariff number for goods classified under general rules of interpretation 3(b) or 3(c).

values.label: 2nd specified tariff quantity, general rules of interpretation 3(c) or 3(b)
values.comment: Secondary reportable quantity associated with a tariff classification for goods classified under harmonized tariff schedule general rules of interpretation 3(b) or 3(c).

values.label: 3rd specified tariff quantity, general rules of interpretation 3(c) or 3(b)
values.comment: Third reportable quantity associated with a tariff classification for goods classified under harmonized tariff schedule general rules of interpretation 3(b) or 3(c).

values.label: Showroom size
values.comment: The relative bigness of a room used for display.

values.label: Reserves
values.comment: Measurement of reserves maintained.

values.label: Height reference point
values.comment: The point from which the reference height is determined.

values.label: Available for cultivation
values.comment: The purpose is to measure the availability for cultivation.

values.label: Quantity received
values.comment: Code qualifying the purpose of the measurement, to indicate the quantity received

values.label: Quantity retained
values.comment: Code qualifying the purpose of the measurement, to indicate the quantity retained

values.label: Quantity to be delivered
values.comment: Code qualifying the purpose of the measurement, to indicate the quantity to be delivered

values.label: Quantity to be delivered
values.comment: Code qualifying the purpose of the measurement, to indicate the quantity to be delivered

values.label: Chemistry
values.comment: The given measurement value identifies the amount or percentage of a specific chemical within a substance.

values.label: Chargeable weight
values.comment: The weight on which charges are based.

values.label: Core notch dimensions
values.comment: The notch dimensions of a core.

values.label: Core size
values.comment: The size of a core.

values.label: Counts
values.comment: The measurement is counts.

values.label: Density
values.comment: Code to indicate the mass of a commodity per unit of volume.

values.label: Dimensional tolerance
values.comment: Possible range of values for a specified measurement dimension of a product, material or package.

values.label: Discrete measurement value
values.comment: The measurement specified is separate and distinct from other measurements.

values.label: Dimension used in price extension
values.comment: Dimension will be used in conjunction with price extension.

values.label: Environmental conditions
values.comment: The data values to be reported reflect the environmental conditions surrounding a situation including but not limited to test environments.

values.label: Footage
values.comment: Length or distance in feet.

values.label: Interpolated value
values.comment: The value based on interpolation.

values.label: Vessel overall length
values.comment: Total overall length of the vessel.

values.label: Limited weight/size coils
values.comment: Measurement identifying weight or size limit of coils.

values.label: Length limitations
values.comment: Indicates that value/range information is understood as length limitation.

values.label: Lift limitation
values.comment: A measurement indicating lift capacity limitations.

values.label: Loading meters
values.comment: The length in a vehicle, whereby the complete width and height over that length is needed for the goods.

values.label: Payload
values.comment: The revenue-producing load carried by a means of transport.

values.label: Parting cut (sawcut)
values.comment: Cut identifying parts of an item probably for separation.

values.label: Physical dimensions (product ordered)
values.comment: Specified measurement dimensions refer to physical dimensions of a product, material or package.

values.label: Package limitations
values.comment: A measurement indicating limitations associated with the package.

values.label: Platform limitation
values.comment: A measurement indicating limitations in relation to a platform.

values.label: Receiving facility limitations
values.comment: Specified measurement dimensions are provided as a result of limitations or restrictions related to the physical dimensions of a product, material or package at the reception point.

values.label: Property specification
values.comment: Indicates that the data to follow are target specifications.

values.label: Shipping tolerance
values.comment: Tolerances related to shipping.

values.label: Shade
values.comment: The degree to which a colour is mixed with black or is decreasingly illuminated.

values.label: Storage limitation
values.comment: A measurement indicating limitation in relation to storage.

values.label: Surface roughness
values.comment: The measurement of roughness of a surface.

values.label: Surface treatment
values.comment: The attribute being measured is the surface treatment.

values.label: Surface
values.comment: Surface area of an object.

values.label: Specification value
values.comment: A measurable item characteristic specified by the buyer, seller or third party.

values.label: Temperature
values.comment: The measured attribute is temperature.

values.label: Transportation equipment limitations
values.comment: A measurement indicating limitations in relation to transportation equipment.

values.label: Test result
values.comment: Indicates that the data to follow is the test result measurements.

values.label: Volume
values.comment: Size or measure of anything in three dimensions.

values.label: Weights
values.comment: The measured attribute is weight.

values.label: Weight used in price extension
values.comment: Weight will be used in conjunction with price extension.
